sentences.en: A couple of men started fighting and we had to pull them apart .
sentences.cn: 几名男子打起架来，我们不得不将他们拉开。

sentences.en: Don't think it hasn't torn me apart to be away from you.
sentences.cn: 不骗你，离开你让我痛苦万分。

sentences.en: He set his skinny legs apart and threw back his shoulders.
sentences.cn: 他叉开两条细腿，猛地挺起胸膛。

sentences.en: Her marriage to film producer Michael Greenburg fell apart.
sentences.cn: 她和电影制片人迈克尔·格林伯格的婚姻破裂了。

sentences.en: I was falling apart. I wasn't getting any sleep.
sentences.cn: 我要崩溃了，我一直都没合眼。

sentences.en: Joel stood apart from the group, frowning.
sentences.cn: 乔尔皱着眉头，独自站在一边。

sentences.en: Many school buildings are unsafe, and some are falling apart.
sentences.cn: 许多校舍不安全，有些简直是摇摇欲坠。

sentences.en: My wife and I are living apart at the moment.
sentences.cn: 目前我和妻子分居。

sentences.en: quite apart from all the work, he had such financial problems.
sentences.cn: 除了所有这些工作要做以外，他还有经济困难的问题。

sentences.en: Ray and sister Renee lived just 25 miles apart from each other.
sentences.cn: 雷和妹妹勒妮的住处仅相隔25英里。

sentences.en: She tore the rose apart and scattered the petals over the grave.
sentences.cn: 她掰开玫瑰花，将花瓣撒在坟墓上。

sentences.en: She was the only British competitor apart from Richard Meade.
sentences.cn: 她是除了理查德·米德之外唯一的英国参赛者。

sentences.en: Sometimes things have to fall apart to make way for better things.
sentences.cn: 有时候要到达谷底，才会慢慢变好。

sentences.en: Sow the seeds in drills about 1/2in. deep and 12in. apart.
sentences.cn: 在深约0.5英寸，间隔12英寸的条播沟里播种。

sentences.en: The children have never been apart before.
sentences.cn: 孩子们以前从来没有分开过。

sentences.en: The house is so old and crummy it's falling apart.
sentences.cn: 那座房子太破旧，都开始坍塌了。

sentences.en: The police try to keep rival supporters apart at all matches.
sentences.cn: 警方在所有的比赛中都设法将双方的支持者分开。

sentences.en: The room was empty apart from one man seated beside the fire.
sentences.cn: 除了有个男人坐在火炉边，房间里空荡荡的。

sentences.en: the whole world seemed to be sleeping, apart from Barbara.
sentences.cn: 除了芭芭拉，整个世界看上去都在沉睡。

sentences.en: Their concept of a performance and our concept were miles apart.
sentences.cn: 他们对一场表演的概念和我们的概念相去甚远。

sentences.en: Their two faces were hardly more than eighteen inches apart.
sentences.cn: 他俩的脸相隔还不到18英寸。

sentences.en: They have offices in countries as far apart as India and Peru.
sentences.cn: 他们的办事处远至印度、秘鲁等国。

sentences.en: They will take that problem apart and analyze it in great detail.
sentences.cn: 他们会认真分析那个问题，指出其症结所在。

sentences.en: This was, New York apart, the first American city I had ever been in where people actually lived downtown.
sentences.cn: 这是除纽约以外我所呆过的居民实际住在市中心的第一座美国城市。

sentences.en: Underneath this image of normalcy, addiction threatened to rip this family apart.
sentences.cn: 在这一切正常的表象下潜伏的是将使这个家庭四分五裂的毒瘾。

phrases.tran_cn: 截然相反；天壤之别；大相径庭

trans.tran_en: If people or groups are a long way apart on a particular topic or issue, they have completely different views and disagree about it

trans.tran_cn: 相隔，分开，分离，成碎片，分裂，独特地，除外
trans.tran_en: if things are apart, they are not close to each other or touching each other
if things are apart, they are not close to each other or touching each other
